summary: The bchat system underwent a comprehensive development session, focusing on workspace cleanup, multi-provider API integration, and Claude Sonnet 4 configuration, in preparation for production deployment. Initial testing for Claude Code integration and immediate processing was also performed.

sections.title: Key Achievements
items: Proceed with multi-provider API integration for the bchat system.
Configure Claude Sonnet 4 for the bchat system.
Prepare the bchat system for production deployment.
